claim: The Avengers (2012 film) features Robert Downey Jr.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As the franchise is composed of films adapted from a variety of Marvel Comics properties , there are multiple lead actors : Robert Downey , Jr. stars as Tony Stark / Iron Man in the films Iron Man  (  2008  )  , Iron Man 2  (  2010  )  , and Iron Man 3  (  2013  )  ; Chris Hemsworth plays Thor in Thor  (  2011  )  , Thor : The Dark World  (  2013  )  , and Thor : Ragnarok  (  2017  )  ; and Chris Evans portrays Steve Rogers / Captain America in Captain America : The First Avenger  (  2011  )  , Captain America : The Winter Soldier  (  2014  )  , and again in Captain America : Civil War  (  2016  )  , where he is joined by Downey as Stark .
